name: Smashy City: Monster Rampage
description:
Train your Monsters and build your team to battle around the sequel to Smashy City, the game downloaded by more than 15 Million players. Go on an adventure and compete in real time!

Features:
- Compete in Tournaments across the globe
- Discover different monsters in different regions
- More Monsters being discovered every month
- Train up your monster quickly in our minigame section
- Craft your own strategy to defeat the boss battles
